doc.title: Gricka vjestica
doc.plot: Gricka vjestica (in English "Witch of Gric;" Gric is a part of Croatian capital town Zagreb) is about young countess Nera Keglevic. She is fighting against believing in witches an witchcraft. But the problem is that towns judge Krajacic is accusing Nera to be witch for revenge. Based on novels: "Kontesa Nera" (Countess Nera), "Malleus Maleficarum", "Suparnica Marije Terezije I % II" (Rival of Maria Teresa), "Dvorska kamarila" (Court camarilla) and "Buntovnik na prijestolju" (Rebel on the throne) - all part of Gricka vjestica
